#{isMarket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_shop = #{isShop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_group = #{isGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_flash_sale = #{isFlashSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from QL_COMPANYS c where c.DISABLED = 'false'
and c.COMPANY_NAME like '%${topSearchLike}%'
and address like '%${address}%'

select from QL_COMPANYS where 1=1
and COMPANY_NAME like '%${topSearchLike}%'
and address like '%${address}%'
limit #{page},#{rows}
